sponsors: G. Boswell; D. Douglas; G. Elkins; S. Funke Frommeyer; R. Girdler; S. Meredith; R. Mills; J. Schickel; L. Tichenor; W. Westerfield; P. Wheeler; G. Williams; M. Wise
summary: Amend KRS 150.170 to allow a bona fide resident landowner and other authorized persons to take fish from any lake or pond located on the owner's property without procuring a sport fishing license.

title: AN ACT relating to firearms.
summary: Create new sections of KRS Chapter 237 to define "safe storage depository" and require an owner or custodian of a firearm to store the firearm in a safe storage depository or render the firearm incapable of being fired using a gun-locking device; require an owner or other person lawfully in possession of a firearm or any person who sells ammunition to report the loss or theft of the firearm or ammunition to a law enforcement agency.

title: A JOINT RESOLUTION designating a portion of Kentucky Route 371 in Kenton County as the Michael Scott "Bubba" Wilson Memorial Highway.
summary: Designate a portion of Kentucky Route 371 in Kenton County as the Michael Scott "Bubba" Wilson Memorial Highway.

title: A JOINT RESOLUTION designating the Tom Brahm Memorial Highway in Marion County.
summary: Direct the Transportation Cabinet to designate a portion of Kentucky Route 49 in Marion County as the Tom Brahm Memorial Highway.

summary: Adopt the Rules of Procedure for the 2024 Regular Session of the Senate.

title: A RESOLUTION establishing the 2024 membership of the Kentucky State Senate.
summary: Establish the membership of the 2024 Kentucky State Senate.

title: A RESOLUTION extending an invitation to pastors of Frankfort churches to open sessions of the 2024 Regular Session with prayer.
summary: Extend an invitation to pastors of Frankfort churches to open sessions of the 2024 Regular Session with prayer.

title: A RESOLUTION directing the appointment of a committee to wait upon the Governor.
summary: Appoint a committee of the Senate to wait upon the Governor during the 2024 Retular Session.

summary: Honor 2024 Kentucky Teacher of the Year, Kevin Dailey.

summary: Honor Mark Ihrig for having been selected as a 2023 inductee into the Kentucky Emergency Management Association Hall of Fame.

summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of  Mary "Sue" Butler.

summary: Honor Darlene Thomas upon receiving the 2024 Jean Sabharwal Award for her work and advocacy for Lexington's children and families.

title: A RESOLUTION honoring the life and accomplishments of Alice Dudley Woods Baesler.
summary: Honor the life and accomplishments of Alice Dudley Woods Baesler.

summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of Gary Dale Johnson.

summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of Grace Pool Rucker.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory of Joey Bott.
summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of Joey Bott.

title: A RESOLUTION honoring the life and memory of world-renowned Thoroughbred horse owner, breeder, and pillar of the horse racing industry, Frank L. Jones, Jr.
summary: Honor the life and memory of world-renowned Thoroughbred horse owner, breeder, and pillar of the horse racing industry, Frank L. Jones.

summary: Honor the life and accomplishments of former Kentucky Governor Julian Morton Carroll.

title: A RESOLUTION honoring the life and accomplishments of former Kentucky Governor Brereton Chandler Jones.
summary: Honor the life and accomplishments of former Kentucky Governor Brereton Chandler Jones.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory of Judy Taylor.
summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of Judy Taylor.

title: A RESOLUTION honoring the life and accomplishments of former Kentucky Senator Joseph Richard Wright.
summary: Adjourn the Senate in honor and loving memory of Joseph Richard Wright.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory of Dorothy Jean "Dottie" Sims.
summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of Dorothy Jean "Dottie" Sims.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory of Representative Lamin Swann.
summary: Adjourn the Senate in honor and loving memory of Representative Lamin Swann.

title: A RESOLUTION honoring the life and accomplishments of former Kentucky State Representative Royce William Adams.
summary: Honor the life and accomplishments of former Kentucky State Representative Royce Adams.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory of James W. "Jitter" Allen.
summary: Adjourn the Senate in honor and loving memory of James W. "Jitter" Allen.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory former State Representative Johnnie Hubert "Hubie" Collins.
sponsors: R. Webb; P. Wheeler; J. Higdon
summary: Adjourn in loving memory and honor of former State Representative Hubert Collins.

title: A RESOLUTION adjourning the Senate in honor and loving memory of Philip Richard Konopka.
summary: Adjourn in honor and loving memory of Philip Richard Konopka.

title: A RESOLUTION declaring August 2024 as Railroad Crossings Safety Awareness Month in Kentucky.
sponsors: M. Deneen; G. Boswell; J. Carpenter; G. Elkins; S. Meredith; G. Neal; M. Nemes; S. West; D. Yates
summary: Recognize August 2024 as Railroad Crossings Safety Awareness Month in Kentucky.

title: A RESOLUTION honoring Dr. Kiro John Yun for being named President of the Federation of Midwest Korean American Associations.
summary: Honor Dr. Kiro John Yun for being named President of the Federation of Midwest Korean American Associations.
